p: As shown in Figure 4, concoction had significantly inhibited the O 2 − production and percent inhibition was 26.9 ± 2.55% ( p=0.002). The two positive controls, in vivo (prednisolone) and in vitro (DPI), had also inhibited the O 2 − production significantly and percent inhibitions of O 2 − production were 47.8 ± 1.78% and 48.5 ± 1.97%, respectively ( p < 0.001).
